function.name: washingContaminationLevel_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the contamination level on a washing machine.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the contamination level.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to set the contamination level.

washingContaminationLevel.description: The value to set the contamination level.
